verses.name: 2 Chronicles 36:5
verses.text: Jehoiakim was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem: and he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord his God.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 36:6
verses.text: Against him came up Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and bound him in fetters, to carry him to Babylon.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 36:7
verses.text: Nebuchadnezzar also carried of the vessels of the house of the Lord to Babylon, and put them in his temple at Babylon.
